title: Firefox updated to 101.0.1 and now, when I try to open the browser, I get this error:
content:
Firefox updated to 101.0.1 overnight. When I try to open the browser, I get this error message:

Error: Platform version '101.0.1' is not compatible with 

minVersion >= 101.0 maxVersion <= 101.0

Not sure what to do...any and all suggestions appreciated.
creator: tracy.moore

title: Redirect notice
content: I am constantly getting 'Redirect Notice' when I click on a google image. " The previous page is sending you to...http;//" " If you do not want to visit that page, you can return to the previous page " Ive tried the about:config fix and it DOES NOT WORKÂ !
creator: nollaigpcs

title: Picture-in-picture default settings
content: I recently did a fresh install of Firefox, and now picture-in-picture videos are defaulting always to the top-left corner of the screen and to not stay always on top; each time I open a video or refresh the page and re-start picture-in-picture it reverts to these defaults and I have to manually change it each time. Previously the default had been always on top and would show up in the location & at the size of my previous usage. I would like to adjust the default settings to make that happen again, but I can't find where to do that. I'd appreciate information on how to do this. Thank you!
creator: strawberryleaves

title: Why are you so hard on people with disabilities?  --Dark Mode
content:
I was using Firefox and Owl (the addon).

I just upgraded to Fedora 36. I treid installing Owl and an alternative called "Dark Reader" and both cause a message stating they are corrupted.

I enabled dark mode in the browser. Google immediately changed to a dark background which I can more easily see. This site ignores the setting and is forcing me to work with very limited ivsion

I can barely make out the UI. I found what might be a solution at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1356233 but after hours trying to read it I gave up and am wirting here.

It is very frustrating that other sites respond to firefox settings and your support site does not.
creator: ThePowerTool
